# itemSize

**Instance Property**

The frame size for each item in the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemSize: NSSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can override the value of this property on a per-item basis, by providing a delegate object to the scrubber that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberFlowLayoutDelegate] protocol. This delegate object must implement the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberFlowLayoutDelegate/scrubber(_:layout:sizeForItemAt:)] method.

The default value for this property has a width of `50.0` points and a height of `30.0` points.

## Configuring the layout

- **itemSpacing**: The horizontal spacing between items, specified in points.

items.description: The horizontal spacing between items, specified in points.
